name: Banner-Lords
default_description: Banner-Lords is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 49 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Banner-Lords is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 33 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description: Hereditary Knights of Kaerok, the Banner Lords swear blindallegiance to King Tayba. His majesty has tasked them withwaging his war of expansion, and protecting the royaladministrators posted at Kaerok Castle. These fearsome knightswill let no soul pass without a royal scroll.

name: Barbarians
default_description: Barbarians is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 50 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Barbarians is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 27 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description: The Barbarians of Hark'han are opportunists ever eager to offertheir mercenary services to the highest bidder. When theservants of the Corruption first came from the East with theirdragon, they quickly made a pact granting them control of theregion they now patrol as the Deadlands.

name: Dark Elves
default_description: Dark Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 41 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Dark Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 30 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description: Fallen from grace in their homelands of Aravia, the Dark Elves inhabit the forests that border the realms of Teleria. They see persecutions in Kaerok rather as a boon than a bane supplying them with a stream of silver. They have set up tolls for those anxious to pass safely, but woe betide those who cannot pay.

name: Demonspawn
default_description: Demonspawn is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 34 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Demonspawn is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 22 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description: Beyond the dark portal lies a realm of fire and darkness. It is thehome of ancient beings born of darkness. Forbidden fromsetting foot in the fair lands of Teleria, these foul entities haveconspired with Necromancers to breed Demonspawn - unholyunions of Demon and mortal

name: Dwarves
default_description: Dwarves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 32 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Dwarves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description:
Proud and suspicious of outsiders, the Dwarves have long clung to tradition and isolationism. They were once known across Teleria as peerless craftsmen and steadfast warriors, and although these skills have never waned, the hubris of Dwarven royalty ensured that contact with the outside world gradually stopped. Were if not for the occasional mercenary or merchant, their very existence might have been forgotten.
It was only the recent invasion by the demonic legions of Siroth and their undead minions that has opened the eyes of the Dwarven King to grim reality. Through courage, determination, and sacrifice, the unholy horde has eventually been repelled. But the devastation that it wrought was too great to ignore. Now, driven forth by the calls for justice, Dwarves send their greatest heroes to the surface to bring the battle to their hated foe.

name: High Elves
default_description: High Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 32 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: High Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 25 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description: High Elves originate from Aravia where they have built a wondrous, shimmering city. Living in these lands of plenty has enabled them to evolve their society to the highest degree of physical, intellectual, and spiritual achievement. High-principled, they welcome exiles and offer them new homes further east.

name: Knight Revenant
default_description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 37 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 22 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description: Disciples of the K'leth death cult, the Knights Revenant see themselves as vessels of the spirits of the dead of their order. They raid indiscriminately to capture slaves to support themselves and as ritual sacrifices. Upon initiation, devotees surrender their bodies to the spirits of dark warriors.

name: Lizardmen
default_description: Lizardmen is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 29 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Lizardmen is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 22 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description: The Lizardmen evolved from the brackish waters of Teleria longbefore modern humanoid races emerged with more powerfulbrains. These fearsome amphibious bipeds have been deemeduntouchable but are tolerated in swamps and city sewers. Theytrade through messengers to get sustenance, or ransom for theircaptives.

name: Ogryn-Tribes
default_description: Ogryn-Tribes is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 35 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Ogryn-Tribes is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 25 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description: Subhuman giants with prodigious bellies and brawn, Ogryns arenonetheless sluggish, dumb brutes prone to servitude. Yet theseterrifying great oafs often prove that brute force and ignorancewill often win the day. Together with the Skinwalkers they controlFelwin's Gate, entry to the Kingdom of Aravia.

name: Orcs
default_description: Orcs is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 37 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Orcs is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 24 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description: Orcish tribes maintain a tenuous hold in pockets from Durham Forest to the Deadlands. Initially bred as warrior slaves, Orcs do what they must to ensure their survival, and will pick off unwitting travelers for their coin, blood and bones. Fearful of persecution by the men of Kaerok, they have sided with the Queen of Aravia.

name: Sacred Order
default_description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 60 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 47 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description: For centuries the Knights of the Sacred Order were charged with cleansing Teleria of evil in all its guises. But since the declaration of war, they have sworn allegiance to the Queen of Aravia. In league with the Queen's Necromancer, these once-holy knights now enforce her Majesty's will and guard her chattel.

name: Skinwalkers
default_description: Skinwalkers is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 27 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Skinwalkers is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 18 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description: As told by the tragic legend of Ch'arocah, Skinwalkers once had the power to cast themselves in the form of any man or beast. But after centuries of overuse, these shamans found themselves entrapped as something less than human, but more than animal. Though wild and dangerous, they can sense evil and may act to prevent it

name: Undead Hordes
default_description: Undead Hordes is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 54 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Undead Hordes is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 30 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

raw_description: Awakened by the call of the Corruption, these ghouls andcreatures of the night inhabit the forgotten tombs and darkplaces of the world, and serve as minions to the Dark One. Whilemost are the desecrated carcasses of fallen Telerians, othershave lurked in the darkness for centuries... awaiting their time.
